title: Software Engineer II
body: Lead NodeJS API developer modernizing legacy mainframe system onto AWS.
Spearheaded migration of MySQL databases in AWS Cloud with AWS Database Migration Service.
Documented and established best practices for Terraform infrastructure and query configuration.
Lead communication with the Enterprise Data Migration team to ensure data migration success.

title: Software Engineer I
body: Revamped Java Spring Boot applications into AWS cloud-native applications deployed in production for The Travelers Insurance until December 2023.

Developed, documented, and integrated JavaScript AWS Lambda functions with various APIs, databases, and AWS cloud services and created comprehensive internal testing documentation, providing a knowledge base for all ongoing projects.
Automated multi-region infrastructure provisioning and management using Terraform for AWS Lambda functions, KMS keys, and DynamoDB tables, improving resilience and data accessibility.

Implemented monitoring and alerting for JavaScript AWS Lambda Functions with flexible JSON ElasticSearch queries and email alerts, uncovering a critical dependency issue impacting 50% of billing communication emails.
Earned two peer-nominated awards for streamlining team member onboarding through comprehensive documentation, daily check-ins, and structured pair programming.
Transitioned, updated and debugged Angular 11 clients to Angular 17.

title: Software Engineer
body: Designed, created, and tested three RESTful Java Full Stack apps with Angular 11 clients and BootStrap 4 design, coupled with Spring Boot servers utilizing Spring Data JPA for data persistence in PostgreSQL databases.
Configured PostgreSQL tables on Amazon RDS and set up servers on Amazon EC2 to enhance scalability and ensure public access to web applications.
Revamped CI/CD practices by configuring Jenkinsfile and GitHub webhooks to automate testing, SonarQube code coverage, and application build and deployment processes.
Conducted automated integration testing using Selenium WebDriver.
